text: Cummings C. Chesney (Selinsgrove, Pennsylvania, October 28, 1863 - November 27, 1947) was an electrical engineer who made major contributions to alternating current power systems. ==References== *IEEE History Site Cummings C. Chesney *Hall of History Biography Category:1863 births Category:1947 deaths Category:American electrical engineers Category:IEEE Edison Medal recipients Category:People from Selinsgrove, Pennsylvania Category:Engineers from Pennsylvania
title: Cummings C. Chesney
